Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    mdlaf.components.filechooser.MaterialFileChooserUI.MaterialFileChooserEvents
    This class is deprecated because the developer found an bun inside mouse hover effect on button This class will be removed inside the version 1.1.1 after the test inside the version rc4.
    mdlaf.components.tabbedpane.MaterialTabbedPaneUI.MaterialTabbedPaneLayout
    remove this implementation inside the version 1.2 of the library.
    mdlaf.components.taskpane.MaterialTaskPaneUI.ChangeIconOnClick
    This class is deprecated from version 1.1.1 official and will be removed in the version 1.2 the function of this class is made from the native SwingX 1.6.1 class. Look the class MaterialPaneBorder, the icons now is changed inside the paintChevronControls method
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    mdlaf.utils.MaterialImageFactory.DOWN_ARROW
    Use iconfont, look the documentation here https://github.com/vincenzopalazzo/material-ui-swing/blob/master/docs/CHANGELOG.md#used-iconfontswing-library-for-add-other-icons
    mdlaf.utils.MaterialImageFactory.LEFT_ARROW
    Use iconfont, look the documentation here https://github.com/vincenzopalazzo/material-ui-swing/blob/master/docs/CHANGELOG.md#used-iconfontswing-library-for-add-other-icons
    mdlaf.components.filechooser.MaterialFileChooserUI.lifeCycleEvent
    This propriety is deprecated because the developer found an bun inside mouse hover effect on button This propriety will be removed inside the version 1.1.1 after the test inside the version rc4.
    mdlaf.utils.MaterialImageFactory.RIGHT_ARROW
    Use iconfont, look the documentation here https://github.com/vincenzopalazzo/material-ui-swing/blob/master/docs/CHANGELOG.md#used-iconfontswing-library-for-add-other-icons
    mdlaf.utils.MaterialImageFactory.UP_ARROW
    Use iconfont, look the documentation here https://github.com/vincenzopalazzo/material-ui-swing/blob/master/docs/CHANGELOG.md#used-iconfontswing-library-for-add-other-icons

    Method and Description
    mdlaf.animation.MaterialUIMovement.add(JComponent, Color)
    This method will be deprecated inside the version 1.2 of the library. you can @see getMovement method
    mdlaf.animation.MaterialUIMovement.add(JComponent, Color, int, int)
    This method will be deprecated inside the version 1.2 of the library. you can @see getMovement method
    mdlaf.utils.MaterialFontFactory.fontUtilsDisplayable(String, Font)
    this method will be removed in the version 1.2, this method is not really util fot the library.

    This method will be removed inside the version 1.2, it is a old method used inside the Timer to restore the default value

    This method will be removed inside the version 1.2, it is a old method used inside the Timer to restore the default value
    mdlaf.animation.MaterialUIMovement.getStaticMovement(JComponent, Color, Color)
    This method will be removed inside the version 1.2, because with the new MaterialButtonApi, you can create a personal instance of the button, with an personal Listener, @see MaterialButtonUI

    This method will be removed inside the version 1.2, it is a old method used inside the Timer to restore the default value
